"},{"text":"Slime Fests","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"During a Slime Fests event, Slimes will merge, naturally spawn, and reanimate from slimeballs.

Small slimes will spawn in dark spaces and slimeballs on the floor will turn into slimes."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.slime_fests.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Two slimes of the same size will merge together to form a larger slime.\n\nHuge slimes can be created this way, which will drop a special loot table when killed."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.slime_fests.2"}]}]
